content: lace pattern needle 3 k1 ssk k to end repeat this round until there are 12 sts each on needles 1 and 3 48 sts total foot continue knitting in st st for needles 1 and 3 while working lace leg pattern across needle 2 until foot is 2 inches less than desired length toe round 1 needle 1 k to last 3 sts on needle 1 k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of round round 2 knit all sts continue these 2 rnds until there are 12 sts remaining use kitchener st to graft your toe weave in ends and repeat for second sock this is a free pattern for personal use only it may not be used for commercial purposes 3 pattern and all photography © 2008 aquaknits and sknitches
